definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: The so - called poet ground out some verses.
sentences.chinese: 这个所谓的诗人搜索枯肠做成几句诗。

sentences.english: A poet is, before anything else, a person who is passionately in love with language. -W. H.
sentences.chinese: 一个诗人，首先应当是一个非常热爱语言的人。

sentences.english: Pays great attention to the form in this time poet to be elegant, strives for perfection to the poem skill.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时期诗人注重形式典雅，对诗艺精益求精。

sentences.english: His poetic achievement stands at the center of modern literature.
sentences.chinese: 他是最优秀的英文诗人之一，是现代文学的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Frankish poet and prelate at the court of Charlemagne.
sentences.chinese: 法兰克诗人和查理曼宫廷的高级教士。

sentences.english: Dhaucer is buried in "poet's Dorner", as might have been expected.
sentences.chinese: 正如许多人已经预料的，乔叟被葬在“诗人角”。

sentences.english: Lu You was a famous patriotic poet in the Southern Song Dyansty .
sentences.chinese: 陆游诗南宋著名的爱国诗人。

sentences.english: There have existed a large number of poems with "heart-broken" themes in the middle and late Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中晚唐诗人具有不同于初唐和盛唐诗人的敏感性。

sentences.english: There have existed a large number of poems with "heart-broken" themes in the middle and late Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中晚唐诗人具有不同于初唐和盛唐诗人的敏感性。

sentences.english: This poem expressed the poet's affection in the cockles of the heart and the loyalism in the poem was sincere.
sentences.chinese: 该诗是诗人自鸣中怀之作，诗中所表忠义确系真心。

sentences.english: Du fu, ancient Chinese poetry history one of the greatest poets.
sentences.chinese: 杜甫，中国古代诗歌史上最巨大的诗人之一。

sentences.english: My poet's vanity dies in shame before thy sight.
sentences.chinese: 我的诗人的虚荣心，在你的容光中羞死。

sentences.english: Nasonlanbo was a very famous poetess in the history of Mongolian literature in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 那逊兰保是清代蒙古族文学史上著名的女诗人。

sentences.english: Liuyuxi is an outstanding statesman and exiling poem in middle of Tang Dynasty .
sentences.chinese: 刘禹锡是中唐时期杰出的政治家兼贬谪诗人。

sentences.english: With beautiful words of adoration to the Lord, the psalmist likens several attributes of God to the different wonders of nature.
sentences.chinese: 诗人用好几个自然界的壮观景像，来形容上帝的属性。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
School of Minor-talks, one of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1] during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
Misty Poetry, a post-Cultural Revolution poetry movement
writer of 詞|词[ci2] (a kind of Classical Chinese poem)/person of literary talent
